GSD.description:
scsi: qedf: Add stag_work to all the vports

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.101 by commit aa7352aa155e19815b41f09f114fe9f110fde4d8. For more details please see the references link.
